title: Clash of Clans and Clash Royale mobile revenue 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Game in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Game Clash Royale and lowest at Game Clash of Clans.
The highest Game Clash Royale has 30.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Game Clash of Clans.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Game, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Game on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Game Clash Royale and lowest at Game Clash of Clans.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Game in the x axis and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Game Clash Royale and lowest at Game Clash of Clans.
The highest Game Clash Royale has 30.0 more Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Game Clash of Clans.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Game, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Game on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 597.0 is found at Game Clash Royale and the minimum is found at Clash of Clans where Game is 567.0.
There is a difference of 30.0 between the maximum Game Clash Royale and minimum Game Clash of Clans.
The Game Clash Royale tends to be 1.03 percent higher than average.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is 1164.0 if we add up values of all Games.
